subject: Public Speaking
title: Strategic Suspense
description: A quick win: understand Strategic Suspense.

hook.text: Don't reveal everything upfront. Withhold information strategically.

buildup.text: Suspense is the gap between what audiences know and want to know.

discovery.text: Create curiosity loops: hint at information, delay the reveal.

twist.text: Audiences stay engaged when they're waiting to find out.

climax.text: Suspense transforms passive listeners into active participants.

punchline.text: Make them wait. Anticipation is powerful.

quiz.question: What creates suspense?
options: Gap between what's known and what's withheld
